fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, you may choose a player to Jail the following night.
- You may choose to torture your prisoner instead, You will both be blackmailed the next day and you will learn their alignment (Good, Evil, Neutral). (2 use)
- You may choose to execute your prisoner. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot Execute someone Day 1.
- You may not Jail the same player twice in a row, unless you tortured them last night.
- You may anonymously talk with your prisoner.
- Jailed players cannot be targeted by any direct ability.
- If you execute a Village member, you will lose the ability to execute.
